title: The Scientific Alternative to Neo-Darwinian Evolutionary Theory
description: The alternative we offer here to Darwinian theory remains strictly scientific in that it recognizes one vital Simple machines ... CANNOT evolve upwards by Darwinian creative mutations followed by natural selection, simply because they do not reproduce, UNLESS those "machines" were SELF AWARE. For how can any real scientist maintain that self-awareness---one of the most developed attributes of man---be developed by Darwinian mechanisms when no one knows even of what self-awareness consists or when it came
author: A.E. Wilder-Smith
